```{r}
install.packages('ggbeeswarm')
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpointdensity)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(scales)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(beeswarm)
```

```{r}
user_data <- read.csv("user_behavior_dataset.csv", header = TRUE)
```


```{r}
user_means <- user_data |>
  group_by(Operating.System) |>
  summarise(mean_age = mean(Age, na.rm = TRUE),
            mean_app_time = mean(App.Usage.Time..min.day.),
            mean_screen_on = mean(Screen.On.Time..hours.day.),
            mean_battery = mean(Battery.Drain..mAh.day.),
            mean_apps_installed = mean(Number.of.Apps.Installed),
            mean_data = mean(Data.Usage..MB.day.))
```

```{r}
plot1 <- ggplot(data = user_means, aes(x = Operating.System, y = mean_age)) + 
                  geom_bar(stat = "identity") + 
                  labs(title = "Bar Plot of Mean Age by Operating System")
plot1                  
```

```{r}
plot2 <- ggplot(data = user_data, aes(x = Gender, y = App.Usage.Time..min.day.)) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs( title = "Boxplot of App Usage in Minutes/Day by Gender")
plot2
```

```{r}
plot3 <- ggplot(user_data, aes(x = Screen.On.Time..hours.day., y = Number.of.Apps.Installed, color = Gender)) + geom_point() + geom_jitter(width = 0.1, alpha = 0.3) + labs(title = "Screen Time (Hours/Day) & Number of Apps Installed by Behavior Class & Gender", x = "Screen Time", y = "Number of Apps") +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(User.Behavior.Class))
plot3
```
```{r}
plot4 <- ggplot(data = user_data, mapping = aes(x = Age, y = Data.Usage..MB.day., fill = Gender)) +
  geom_area() + 
  scale_fill_ipsum() +
  scale_y_comma() +
  labs(title="Gender distribution of Age and Data Usage Per Day") +
  theme_ipsum_rc(grid="XY") +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(hjust=c(0, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 1))) +
  theme(legend.position="bottom")
plot4
```



```{r}
plot5 <- ggplot(data = user_data, aes(x = factor(Operating.System), y = Battery.Drain..mAh.day., color=factor(Gender))) + 
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom() +
  labs(title = "Beeswarm Plot of Battery Drainage by Operating System & Gender", x = "Operating System", y = "Battery Drainage")
plot5
```
